name: Primary
aboutCourse:
The School Direct (Salaried) route offers school-based training with support from experienced teachers at St Joseph's and link tutors at St Mary's University. Some attendance at University will be required but most of the course is delivered in school.

For further information about course content, please visit: https://www.stmarys.ac.uk/teacher-training/school-direct/overview.aspx
howSchoolPlacementsWork: The main placement will be at St Joseph's or one of our Alliance schools. You will also spend a short period of your training in another school to broaden your experience.
otherRequirements:
There is an expectation that applicants will have previous relevant experience in an educational setting.

Successful candidates will receive an offer of employment. This will be subject to all usual recruitment checks and an Enhanced DBS clearance.
salaryDetails: The salary for School Direct (Salaried) students will be calculated using the unqualified teachers' pay scales.
